description.value:
You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Terrain Stalker]{Terrain Stalker} skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time.

If you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Avoid Notice]{Avoid Notice} while exploring and any allies use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Follow the Expert]{Follow the Expert} to follow you as you do so, you can choose one of those allies to gain the benefit of any one Terrain Stalker feat you have.
